member.summary: Indicates if the values set for the spacing parameters must be interpreted as absolute units.

member.summary: Number comprised between 0 and 1 to define the relative position of the break point on the last segment of the links; that is on the link segment that is paralleled to the tree direction.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Schematic.ISchematicAlgoCompactTree.Direction
member.summary: Compact tree structure direction.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Schematic.ISchematicAlgoCompactTree.DistanceAlongTheDirection
member.summary: Spacing between the nodes that display along the compact tree direction; that is, spacing between a node belonging to the (n) hierarchical level and a node belonging to the (n+1) hierarchical level.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Schematic.ISchematicAlgoCompactTree.DistancePerpendicularToDirection
member.summary: Spacing between the nodes that display perpendicularly to the compact tree direction; that is, spacing between the nodes that belong to a same hierarchical level.

member.summary: Indicates if the links must display with right angles.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.Schematic.ISchematicAlgoLinearDispatch
member.summary: Provides access to members that control the Linear Dispatch schematic algorithm.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Schematic.ISchematicAlgoLinearDispatch.AbsoluteParameters
member.summary: Indicates if the values set for the distance parameters must be interpreted as absolute units.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Schematic.ISchematicAlgoLinearDispatch.AttractionFactor
member.summary: Factor used to quickly increase the schematic nodes displacement for nodes that are very close.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Schematic.ISchematicAlgoLinearDispatch.LeaveMaximalShift
member.summary: Maximum distance the leave nodes must be spaced from the nodes that they connect when they are authorized to be moved during the algorithm execution.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Schematic.ISchematicAlgoLinearDispatch.MaximalShift
member.summary: Maximum distance the nodes with degree 2 must be spaced from their link extremity after the algorithm execution. When this distance is reached, nodes are not moved anymore. Must be set only when the NodesMovement type is esriSchematicIterativeDistance.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Schematic.ISchematicAlgoLinearDispatch.MinimalShift
member.summary: Minimum distance the nodes with degree 2 must be spaced from their link extremity after the algorithm execution. Must be set only when the NodesMovement type is esriSchematicUserDefineDistance.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Schematic.ISchematicAlgoLinearDispatch.MoveNodeDeg1
member.summary: Indicates if the leave nodes (that is, the node with degree 1) can be moved during the algorithm execution.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Schematic.ISchematicAlgoLinearDispatch.NodesMovements
member.summary: Node placement option for the layout.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Schematic.ISchematicAlgoLinearDispatch.NotMoveNodeDeg3
member.summary: Indicates if the nodes with degree 3 can not be moved during the algorithm execution.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Schematic.ISchematicAlgoLinearDispatch.NumberOfIterations
member.summary: Number of Linear Dispatch algorithm iterations that will be executed before the final result is shown. Must be set only when the NodesMovement type is esriSchematicIterativeDistance.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Schematic.ISchematicAlgoLinearDispatch.PathPreservation
member.summary: Indicates if the path for the incident links related to the moved nodes is preserved during the algorithm execution.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Schematic.ISchematicAlgoLinearDispatch.TranslateLeaf
member.summary: Indicates if the leaf connected to the path must be moved.

member.summary: The CLSID of the algorithm.

member.summary: Indicates if the algorithm is currently available.

member.summary: Indicates if the algorithm is currently enabled.

member.summary: Indicates if the values set for the spacing parameters must be interpreted as absolute units.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Schematic.ISchematicAlgoSmartTree.BreakPoint
member.summary: Number comprised between 0 and 1 that defines the relative position of the break point on the last segment of the links; that is on the link segment that is paralleled to the tree direction.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Schematic.ISchematicAlgoSmartTree.Direction
member.summary: Smart tree structure direction.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Schematic.ISchematicAlgoSmartTree.DistanceAlongTheDirection
member.summary: Spacing between the nodes that display along the smart tree direction; that is, spacing between a node belonging to the (n) hierarchical level and a node belonging to the (n+1) hierarchical level.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Schematic.ISchematicAlgoSmartTree.DistancePerpendicularToDirection
member.summary: Spacing between the nodes that display perpendicularly to the smart tree direction and that belong to the same subtree level; that is, spacing between the nodes that belong to the same hierarchical level in the same subtree.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Schematic.ISchematicAlgoSmartTree.OrthogonalDisplay
member.summary: Indicates if the links must display with right angles.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Schematic.ISchematicAlgoSmartTree.SubtreeSeparation
member.summary: Spacing between two neighbor subtrees; that is, spacing between the nodes that display perpendicularly to the smart tree direction and that belong to two different subtrees.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.Schematic.ISchematicAlgoSpatialDispatch
member.summary: Provides access to members that control the Spatial Dispatch schematic algorithm (named Separate Nodes algorithm in Schematics 2.3).

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Schematic.ISchematicAlgoSpatialDispatch.AttractionFactor
member.summary: Factor used to quickly increase the schematic nodes displacement for nodes that are very close.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Schematic.ISchematicAlgoSpatialDispatch.MaxShiftFactor
member.summary: Maximum displacement between two moved nodes. Default value used by the algorithm, when the coefficient computed from the attraction factor value is upper than it.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Schematic.ISchematicAlgoSpatialDispatch.MinShiftFactor
member.summary: Minimum displacement between two moved nodes. Default value used by the algorithm, when the coefficient computed from the attraction factor value is lower than it.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Schematic.ISchematicAlgoSpatialDispatch.MoveNeighbours
member.summary: Indicates if the Spatial Dispatch schematic algorithm can move the neighbour nodes of the currently selected nodes if needed.
